95 
96 // Return true if the collision shape is a polyhedron
97 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE bool ConvexPolyhedronShape::isPolyhedron() const {
98  return true;
99 }
100 
101 
102 // Find and return the index of the polyhedron face with the most anti-parallel face
103 // normal given a direction vector. This is used to find the incident face on
104 // a polyhedron of a given reference face of another polyhedron
105 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 ConvexPolyhedronShape::findMostAntiParallelFace(const Vector3& direction) const {
106 
107  decimal minDotProduct = DECIMAL_LARGEST;
108  uint32 mostAntiParallelFace = 0;
109 
110  // For each face of the polyhedron
111  const uint32 nbFaces = getNbFaces();
112  for (uint32 i=0; i < nbFaces; i++) {
113 
114  // Get the face normal
115  const decimal dotProduct = getFaceNormal(i).dot(direction);
116  if (dotProduct < minDotProduct) {
117  minDotProduct = dotProduct;
118  mostAntiParallelFace = i;
119  }
120  }
121 
122  return mostAntiParallelFace;
123 }
124 
125 }
126 
127 #endif
